name: duperheroes
description: A static superhero identification game featuring satirical animal-themed superheroes

scripts.generate-images: cd hero-image-generator && npm install && node src/image-generator.js
scripts.generate-images:dry-run: cd hero-image-generator && npm install && node src/image-generator.js --dry-run
scripts.generate-images:verbose: cd hero-image-generator && npm install && node src/image-generator.js --verbose
scripts.build-images: npm run audit-images && npm run generate-images
scripts.build-images:dry-run: npm run audit-images && npm run generate-images:dry-run

author: Gunnar Hellekson
